t: Amazon.com : Marconi - The Original Chicago Style Hot Giardiniera - 16 oz (2 Pack) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: It used to be carried at World Market and I think I've seen it once before in a random store, but I couldn't remember which. Mezetti giardiniera is terrible. I tried a smaller brand and it was almost there, but way too salty with the wrong veggies. Marconi hot is *the* giardiniera of Italian beef.
